featured.text: Authors also write about these things to inform by giving facts or ideas.
She never calls ______ to inform us of her visits.
To inform the reader how to reduce stress.
I will inform the early morning supervisor.
To inform parents how they can help their children like varied foods. 54.

definition.en_def: To give someone facts or information; to make someone aware of something.
definition.example: Please inform me about the meeting schedule.
